mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_tb(user_uid, page_uid, main_uid, title, content, viewer) VALUES(#{userUid}, #{pageUid}, #{mainUid}, #{title}, #{content}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT p.uid, p.user_uid, u.nickname, p.page_uid, p.main_uid, p.title, p.content, p.viewer, p.created_at, p.deleteyn FROM post_tb p JOIN users_tb u ON p.user_uid = u.uid WHERE p.page_uid = 1 AND p.deleteyn = "N" ORDER BY p.uid DESC;

SELECT p.uid, p.user_uid, u.nickname, p.page_uid, p.main_uid, p.title, p.content, p.viewer, p.created_at, p.deleteyn FROM post_tb p JOIN users_tb u ON p.user_uid = u.uid WHERE p.page_uid = 5 AND p.deleteyn = "N" ORDER BY p.uid DESC;
SELECT uid, user_uid, page_uid, title, content, viewer, created_at, deleteyn FROM post_tb WHERE uid = #{uid} AND deleteyn = "N"
